entry.tran: 不合法的；非法的；违法的
entry.def: If something is unlawful, the law does not allow you to do it.

example.ex: ...employees who believe their dismissal was unlawful...
example.tran: 认为将他们解雇是违法行为的雇员

example.ex: A pushed-in window indicated unlawful entry.
example.tran: 往里推开的窗户表明有人非法入内。
